name: browser
description: connects the assistant to a web browser

args.description:
If browserclick, browsergettext, or browsersendtext - this string contains either a css or xpath selector. The format will be xpath/css|selector
If browserget this string will be the url
For all other functions, args can be blank.

command.description:
launchbrowser: launches browser
browserget: directs browser to URL
browsergettext: gets text of selector
browserclick: clicks selector
browsersendtext: sends text to selector
getbodytext: gets body text of webpage
